name: Dyp
description:
Intro:

Dyp is an adventure game where you have to go deeper through a dungeon full of dangers. Light will be your best friend into the darkness.

Controls:

Game is made for a xbox controller

A is interact (e on keyboard)
X is strike (a on keyboard)
Y is change weapons (z on keyboard)
B is dash (space on keyboard)

Credits:

Guillaume Leclercq - Tech art / FX
Margot Loosdregt- Game Art
Safran Reynaert - Game Art
Baptiste Hollebecq - Game Prog
Martin Delemotte - Game Design/ Game Art
Louis Hilaire - Level Design/Lighting
